data.title: jason richardson – SPORTS AGENT BLOG
data.text:
Jason “J-Rich” Richardson is on to the next one. He has terminated his relationship with basketball agent Dan Fegan, but has not yet chosen a replacement. In 2011, Richardson signed a 4-year, $25 million contract with the Orlando Magic, and was traded to the Philadelphia 76ers in August 2012. He has an option in 2014 and […]

I am not a big fan of “Top __” lists. That said, it is sometimes fun to observe others’ subjective rankings of members in a profession. Kevin Baumer of Business Insider recently created his list of The 12 Most Powerful Agents In The NBA. As for his rankings (with top 3 salaried clients listed): Arn […]
